hero.title: About Me
hero.description1: I’m a 22-year-old with a strong passion for programming and technology. I love tackling complex challenges, finding innovative solutions, and constantly improving myself. I’m always eager to explore new technologies, believing that growth comes through curiosity and continuous learning.
hero.description2: Beyond the world of coding, I have another great passion: cars and engines. I’m fascinated by everything related to mechanics, power, and vehicle design. I love understanding how they work, diving into every technical detail, and getting swept away by the emotions they evoke.
hero.description3: Whether it’s writing code or immersing myself in the world of motors, what drives me is always the same: the desire to understand, experiment, and push beyond every limit.
